A new antibody treatment with the potential to give people instant immunity after being exposed to Covid-19 and prevent illness is being trialled by British scientists in the UK.

articles.title: CNN's Andrew Kaczynski 'Heartbroken' After 9-Month-Old Daughter Dies of Cancer on Christmas Eve - msnNOW
articles.description: The reporter announced in September that his daughter Francesca was diagnosed with "an extremely rare and very aggressive rhabdoid brain tumor"
